variables.name: SA_WEBSITE_URL
variables.desc: The URL of the website to check for uptime.

variables.name: DISCORD_WEBHOOK_URL
variables.desc: The discord webhook URL for messaging.

variables.name: DISCORD_SUCCESS_EMOJI
variables.desc: The emoji to add to the discord message on success.

variables.name: DISCORD_FAILURE_EMOJI
variables.desc: The emoji to add to the discord message on failure.

variables.name: SA_IS_SLEEPER_SCRIPT
variables.desc: If set to 'false', the script executes a single time and dies. Otherwise it runs in a loop.

variables.name: SA_SLEEP_DURATION
variables.desc: The sleep duration between uptime checks.
